title: Document the process of retargeting
body:
Create the process and guidence on the retargeting work which was done:
https://github.com/dotnet/msbuild/issues/10280

nodes.body: Team Triage: Are we sure that there is some usual set of issues we need to resolve, and not some random different issues that we cannot predict? Otherwise, it is not beneficial to document.

There will be not known set of problems. 
The document will focus around the process instead of problems
1 - Upgrading to new tools which involves updates from darc/arcade 
2 - updating the target framework
3 - The guide on what to do in case there are warnings/errors fails (what are preferred steps to take)
Unassigning myself, so it could be picked up if needed.
